: : Rodimus Prime : : 
Rodimus Prime: Good, just take care of him, Flicker. 
Rodimus turns to see that Nightlight was trying to get up but was still too weak. He picks her up into his arms, along with the baby. 
Rodimus Prime: Well we should go to our quarters, love. You need to rest and the baby will need an Ionic shower(I'm stealing things from Star Trek again). 
Rodimus walks out of the Sick Bay, holding his family, and heads for his quarters. 
A lot was on his mind right now. So much had happened recently. His falling in love with Nightlight, the birth of their daughter, it was all good. He had a family. However he was still the General Commander of a Maximal force in the middle of the Neo Beast Wars. Not to mention that he was the Matrix's "Chosen One," Rodimus Prime. That meant that no telling how many past Decepticons and Predacons wanted him dead. Life was complicated.... 
 "cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>" <cardhead649@...> wrote: Flicker::

"Yeah, he'll be all right."  Flicker does his best to sound confident.

>

<P align=center><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG> 
<P align=center><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Good, just take care of him, Flicker. 
<P align=center>Rodimus turns to see that Nightlight was trying to get up but was still too weak. He picks her up into his arms, along with the baby. 
<P align=center><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Well we should go to our quarters, love. You need to rest and the baby will need an Ionic shower(I'm stealing things from Star Trek again). 
<P align=center>Rodimus walks out of the Sick Bay, holding his family, and heads for his quarters. 
<P align=center>A lot was on his mind right now. So much had happened recently. His falling in love with Nightlight, the birth of their daughter, it was all good. He had a family. However he was still the General Commander of a Maximal force in the middle of the Neo Beast Wars. Not to mention that he was the Matrix's "Chosen One," Rodimus Prime. That meant that no telling how many past Decepticons and Predacons wanted him dead. Life was complicated....
